snippet.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Hyperstone Heist Trailer 1993
snippet.description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Hyperstone Heist Trailer 1993

Official Content From Konami

You must help our heroes-on-a-half-shell battle Shredder for possession of the Hyperstone, with which he plans to shrink New York City.
Platforms: Sega Genesis

Sega Genesis
, Action,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Hyperstone Heist
